datum.description: The raw data associated with the specific marker.

xValue.description: The x value of the marker.

yValue.description: The y value of the marker.

highlighted.description: Whether or not the marker is highlighted.

min?.description: Whether or not the marker is a minimum point.

max?.description: Whether or not the marker is a maximum point.

first?.description: Whether or not the marker represents the first data point.

last?.description: Whether or not the marker represents the last data point.

fill?.description: The CSS colour value for the fill of the individual marker.

stroke?.description: The CSS colour value for the outline of the individual marker.

strokeWidth.description: The thickness in pixels for the stroke of the individual marker.

size.description: The width in pixels of the individual marker.

enabled.description: Set to false to make marker invisible.

size.description: The width in pixels of the individual marker.

fill.description: The CSS colour value for the fill of the individual marker.

stroke.description: The CSS colour value for the outline of the individual marker.

strokeWidth.description: The thickness in pixels for the stroke of the individual marker.

datum.description: The raw data associated with the specific column.

xValue.description: The x value of the column.

yValue.description: The y value of the column.

width.description: The width of the column in pixels.

height.description: The height of the column in pixels.

highlighted.description: Whether or not the column is highlighted.

min?.description: Whether or not the column is a minimum point.

max?.description: Whether or not the column is a maximum point.

first?.description: Whether or not the collumn represents the first data point.

last?.description: Whether or not the column represents the last data point.

fill?.description: The CSS colour value for the fill of the individual column.

stroke?.description: The CSS colour value for the outline of the individual column.

strokeWidth.description: The thickness in pixels for the stroke of the individual column.

fill.description: The CSS colour value for the fill of the individual column.

stroke.description: The CSS colour value for the outline of the individual column.

strokeWidth.description: The thickness in pixels for the stroke of the individual column.
